website_summaries.verdict: Supplement that includes Vitamin D to assist with joint pain and inflammation.
pros: These triple-strength tablets include Glucosamine HCl, Chondroitin, and Vitamin D. Several users reported pain relief in less than one week
cons: Those with allergies should know Ingredients contain shellfish
A few users reported the pills being difficult to swallow due to size

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! I started having shoulder joint pain 5 years ago and finally found this 4 years ago. It was amazing - I felt some relief in 1 day and in 3 days my pain was almost gone. I kept using it for a month and tapered off to one pill at night. After a few months I quit using it altogether. I still have flare-ups every few months and restart with 1-2 pills per day depending on severity. Usually I can quit again in a few days and be free of pain for weeks or months. Nothing else has ever had this lasting effect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Larry W

customer_reviews.title: I HAVE ALREADY REORDERED
customer_reviews.text: I have noticed a difference, Even at my age of 91.
customer_reviews.author: Toni Molik

customer_reviews.title: very pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical, but thought I'd try the product. Because of my work moving and installing office furniture, and probably age too (50s), I suffer from almost chronic shoulder and knee joint pain and discomfort. The shoulders especially problematic, sometimes even a comfortable sleep position was hard to find. Been using Osteo Bi Flex for just over a week now and the results are fantastic, noticeable, especially with the shoulder joint pain. Highly recommend it. I'm sleeping sooo much better, and better range of motion during the day
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne

customer_reviews.title: MIRRACLE in a bottle!
customer_reviews.text: I have osteoarthritis is both knees. I was DESPARATE since my insurance stopped covering the hyalueric injections. I've have synvisc, monovisc and the best one was Euflexxa. I even considered paying out of pocket ($3500). I researched stem cells for my knees but learned "other" things besides cartilage was growing. It was actually in my best interest my insurance was denied because THIS STUFF WORKS! The bottle says "7 days" so I committed to 14 days (good things take patients). I can actually JOG! I haven't been able to jog for atleast 10 years. I'm on my 3rd bottle. FYI: That 3rd ingredient "Botswella" is frankincense from the Bible! Go figure!
customer_reviews.author: Leigh Crutch

customer_reviews.title: Works for me!!
customer_reviews.text: I am on my third bottle. After a hard day at work, my knees started hurting when going up stairs, painful and stiff! I was taking stairs one at a time, one foot then the other. After taking for about a month, I could tell the difference, I could take the stairs again with no pain. Very happy with this product, I will not be running out! Have ordered three times, will be ordering again in a week or so, as to not run out!! Very happy!!
customer_reviews.author: Shirley B.

customer_reviews.title: Helps with MS Pain!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 2-pack for my mother-in-law who has multiple sclerosis. I was extremely skeptical, but we'll try anything to help with her pain. She recently changed her diet in the past year, which has made the most difference. She's been taking these pills for about a month now, and she told us that it's greatly helped with her joint pain. Obviously please consult with a specialist, but this may help you or someone in your life deal with their MS symptoms in conjunction with medicine and lifestyle changes.
customer_reviews.author: Xtine

customer_reviews.title: My husband has tendonitis in his wrists (hes a mechanic) ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband has tendonitis in his wrists (hes a mechanic). Within 2 days of taking this, he gained substantially more mobility in his hands without pain.
customer_reviews.author: DIXIEDARLIN

customer_reviews.title: Most Effective Formulation
customer_reviews.text: I am happy that this is available from Amazon. After the product we used previously became unavailable, we found this to be the closest in actual formulation. We feel it's the best combination. My husband uses this regularly, but often doesn't let me know he is "low" till there's one left, so getting it quickly is rather important. So, having it QUICKLY (with PRIME shipping). Is very important.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hetrick

customer_reviews.title: Has worked very well for me for 10+ years. Who cares what the flavor is like?
customer_reviews.text: First things first - I had early knee trouble in my mid-40s, and began taking a half-dose (1 pill) daily. Within a fairly short period of time, my pain and range of motion improved enough that I've stayed with it for the past 10-12 years. So I will always keep taking it until a doctor tells me it will kill me (not such a funny joke these days, given Zantac problems). I was a little taken that Amazon would ask me to rate the Flavor. Umm, these aren't gummies - they are regular pills. In the end, great product! I believe Osteo has given me a number of additional years of pain-free knee activity.
customer_reviews.author: Dave from Coral Springs, FL

customer_reviews.title: A GREAT building block for joint health.
customer_reviews.text: My knees were hurting me horribly from years of OTR truck driving. I got on a regimen of Chondroitin & Glucosamine and after two weeks the pain was more manageable. Now there is really no pain of which to to speak. Added with natural anti - inflammatory supplements, it is nearly completely gone. My joints still click & pop but the pain is 90+% eradicated. This is a great basis for a joint health regimen.
customer_reviews.author: GMJ

customer_reviews.title: Does help with mobility.
customer_reviews.text: I have arthritis in my back and knees, well pretty much all over. I had a cortisone shot and it did help but I still had pain. I was able to walk better with the shot. As for Bio Flex I can tell a difference in mobility. It helps but I'm just going to stick with Extra strength Arthritis Tylenol. The reason is I want to limit the amount of medicine intake and Tylenol does help for a few hours. I do believe Bio Flex makes a difference. Does
customer_reviews.author: Sue E. Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Appears to reduce knee pain.
customer_reviews.text: I have started an "auto re-purchase" to send me a new bottle every 60 days because it appears to have made a marked reduction in the pain that I experience in my knees while climbing stairs and rising from a seated position.
customer_reviews.author: B-52 Gunner Russ

customer_reviews.title: Amazing 5 star product
customer_reviews.text: I am already starting to feel relief in my hands and knees after only a week. My mother has sworn by this product for years and know I see why

customer_reviews.title: It WORKS!!!
customer_reviews.text: A customer where I work recommended this product. I’m 58 years old and I’d begun to stand a lot as a cashier. My knee was beginning to bother me. I started taking this at 1st, 3 pills per day. I am now pain free. I strongly recommend this product. You must be consistent though. If I stop for a while, my knee starts to ache again.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannine Holmes

customer_reviews.title: The knee pain went away
customer_reviews.text: My husband’s pain never totally went away from two knee replacements many years ago. His pain was level 3-4 after starting prescription nerve medicine a few years ago. After starting Osteo Biflex Triple Strength, his pain level is 0-1. Amazing

customer_reviews.title: Great product

customer_reviews.title: No more aching knees...

My elderly mother had used it with great success, so I thought I'd give it a go. I stopped using it for a brief period just to see if, in fact, it was Bi-Flex or my mind. It's the Bi-Flex. It's worked well for me! No more achy knees!!!

customer_reviews.title: I can move again
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical but had to try something. I had 2 epidurals that was wonderful but expensive! I am happy to say after 6 days I would recommend this product. I still have some pain but it is manageable for now. I have suffered with arthritis most of my life but it is becoming more intense the older I get. Very happy!

I took one the first night and felt an immediate relief in flexibility and pain. It also relieves the inflammation. I really love this product because it works. I will keep you posted.👍

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth giving it a try.
customer_reviews.text: Here is what my doctor told me about this product. He told me it works great for some people and does absolutely nothing for some people. He said try it for six weeks and if you don't feel noticeable improvement then stop taking it and wasting your money. My knees had a dull ache. You should not "feel" your knees while you are just sitting down. I guess I am one of the lucky ones. It worked! My knees don't pop nearly as much and I don't feel the dupl ache.
customer_reviews.author: M. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Ths really works
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for years because it works. It helps arthritic joints. I rated flavor 3 because it is a pill which is coated and has no taste. It builds up over time (a few weeks) so don't expect instant results. The doctor told me it would take 4 to 6 weeks, but I felt a difference at 2 weeks but it continued to get even better.

customer_reviews.title: The Jury is out.

It seems I get more from fish oil and Baby aspirin but this stuff? I'm sure the Vitamin D helps but as for the rest of it I really don't know.

product_meta.title: Triple Strength Glucosamine Chondroitin with Vitamin D by Osteo Bi-Flex, for Immune and Bone Health*, 120 Count
product_meta.description: Osteo Bi Flex has Joint Shield, to give your joints the nourishment they need, so you can handle whatever life throws your way. With the addition of Vitamin D to support bone density along with a healthy immune system, Osteo Bi Flex Triple Strength with Vitamin D strengthens your joints and helps maintain flexibility and agility, so you’re always ready for action.Joints help your body walk, run, bend, climb, jump – and anything else you want to do.
feature_bullets: OSTEO BI FLEX TRIPLE STRENGTH: Your joints help you flex, bend, and move so why not give them extra support? Osteo Bi Flex Triple Strength includes Vitamin D, to help support bone density and a healthy immune system, and glucosamine for joint support.*

OSTEO BI FLEX FOR JOINT SUPPORT: Osteo Bi Flex Triple Strength contains glucosamine chondroitin & Vitamin D to help support healthy joints & bones*.Taking Osteo Bi Flex supplements daily may help you maintain flexibility & mobility*

JOINT CARE SUPPLEMENT: If you have concerns over maintaining joint health, joint supplements, like glucosamine, can help keep your joints strong, healthy & flexible, so you can continue enjoying your favorite activities with ease.*

OSTEO BI FLEX JOINT SUPPORT SUPPLEMENT: Osteo Bi Flex carries a range of joint health supplements, to help strengthen joints and support joint comfort and mobility so you can continue to live an active lifestyle*

JOINT SUPPORT SUPPLEMENT: Support joints with Osteo Bi Flex Triple Strength + Vitamin D. Give Osteo Bi Flex a try if you've found benefits from FlexoPlex, GNC, Bioflex, Biocell, Move Free, Jarrow, Gaia, Schiff, or Solgar
*These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration.This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease
